text.div:
Segment_SFT_Map (http://hl7.org/fhir/v2-tofhir)

Mapping from https://www.hl7.org/v2 to https://www.hl7.org/fhir

ACTIVE (not intended for production usage). Published on Mar 1, 2020, 12:00:00 AM by HL7 International (HL7 Orders and Observations Workgroup: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/OO/v2-to-FHIR+IG, Keith W. Boone: kboone@ainq.com). Copyright (c) 2020, HL7 International, Inc., All Rights Reserved.

This ConceptMap represents the mapping from the HL7 V2 SFT Segment to the FHIR MessageHeader Resource representing that segment.


Source CodeRelationshipDestination Code
SFT-2is equivalent toMessageHeader.source.version
SFT-3is equivalent toMessageHeader.source.software

name: Segment_SFT_Map
description: This ConceptMap represents the mapping from the HL7 V2 SFT Segment to the FHIR MessageHeader Resource representing that segment.
